amendment.description: An amendment numbered 31 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to state that no Census Bureau funds may be used in violation of the Bureau's confidentiality policies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clarke (NY) amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Ms. Clarke (NY).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clarke (NY) amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
